a{display:inline-block;height:16px;font-size:11px;color:#191919;font-style:normal;line-height:15px;padding:0 7px;margin:0 12px 0 0;border:1px solid rgba(155,155,155,0.15);border-radius:2px;box-shadow:0 1px 1px 0 rgba(155,155,155,0.05)} .rtl .comments .comment-actions a{margin:0 0 0 12px} .comments .comment-actions a:hover{background-color:rgba(155,155,155,0.03);color:#569fe4} .item-control{display:none} .loadmore.loaded a{display:inline-block;border-bottom:1px solid rgba(155,155,155,.51);text-decoration:none;margin-top:15px} .comments .continue a.comment-reply{display:none} .comments .toplevel-thread>#top-continue a{display:block;color:#569fe4;text-align:center;margin:35px 0 0} .comments .toplevel-thread>#top-continue a:hover{color:#191919} .comments .comment-replies{padding:0 0 0 50px} .thread-expanded .thread-count a,.loadmore{display:none} .comments .footer,.comments .comment-footer{float:left;width:100%;font-size:13px;margin:0} .comments .comment-thread>.comment-replybox-thread{margin:40px 0 0} .comment-form{width:100%;margin:0} p.comments-message{float:left;width:100%;font-size:14px;color:#aaaaaa;font-style:italic;padding:5px 0 15px;margin:0 0 25px;border-bottom:1px solid rgba(155,155,155,0.15)} .no-comments p.comments-message{padding:0 0 20px;margin:0;border:0} p.comments-message>a{color:#569fe4} p.comments-message>a:hover{color:#191919} p.comments-message>em{color:#d63031;font-style:normal} .comment-form>p{display:none} p.comment-footer span{color:#aaaaaa} p.comment-footer span:after{content:'\002A';color:#d63031} iframe#comment-editor{min-height:93px} .comments .toplevel-thread>#top-continue a{display:block;color:#fff;text-align:center;margin:35px 0 0;background:#FFC107;padding:11px 0 11px 0} .comments .toplevel-thread>#top-continue a:hover{color:#191919} @media only screen and (max-width:768px){.post-body img{width:100%;height:auto;}} .post .post-header{display:none} #backtotop {overflow:hidden;position:fixed;z-index:90;right:10px;bottom:10px;width:45px;height:45px;line-height:30px;color:#eee;background-color:#da1313;font-size:20px;text-indent:0;cursor:pointer;padding:4px 0 0;text-align:center;transition:all .5s;border-radius:50%;} #backtotop:hover { background-color: #009933; color: #fff } @media only screen and (max-width:768px){.post-body img{width:100%;height:auto;margin-left:-1em}} /*CSS CLS*/ @media only screen and (min-width : 992px) { #id-slide_index{height: 367.83px; overflow: hidden;} } @media only screen and (max-width : 768px) { #id-slide_index{height: 139.05px; overflow: hidden;} }

Beauty is always an important need for women, understanding that need. Cosmetic was born to bring women quality products with a variety of categories.

Cosmetic specializes in providing natural cosmetics including skin care, hair care, body care, personal care, perfume ... from famous brands in the world. In addition, Cosmetic also has a team of beauty care experts who will advise you in depth about skin, hair, and body to help you choose the most suitable product and bring a confident and attractive look. Anyone can confidently wear their favorite clothes such as office dress, party dress, shirts, men's trousers when going to work or men's T-shirts and women's T-shirts.

When finding genuine cosmetics at online cosmetics stores or stores is still a problem, Cosmetics is your reliable destination. With the aim of giving users good cosmetics or genuine natural cosmetics, Cosmetics only sells products of reputable brands in the country and the world at extremely reasonable prices. Besides Cosmetics supports extremely fast delivery, payment on receipt of goods.
